    • deleteComment

      public boolean deleteComment​(java.util.List<Comment> listOfComments, int Id)

      This function will delete a comment from a list of comments

      Parameters:
      listOfComments - is the list where the comment will remove from
      Id - is necessary to find the right comment
      Returns:
      true if the is deleted successful, false if not
